name: Going to a gas station on a sunday night while another civilization is trying to destroy your house
name_original: Going to a gas station on a sunday night while another civilization is trying to destroy your house
description:
You're craving a coke on a sunday night, but you dont have any at home! Every store nearby is closed, so you need to go to the gas station. While you're on your way there, you meet some strange ships, which are trying to attack your house! You need to destroy 150 ships to survive and get to the gas station.

Contains 3 modes.                                                                                                                                                       Normal - The regular mode, just do as the story.                                                                                     Dodge - You Can't shoot, you need to dodge the ships.                                                                       Infinite - Normal mode, but never-ending

Thanks to Storedband for the player sprite! This will get a texture overhaul soon i guess.
